Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about Velura

What is Velura and how does it work?

Velura is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries, and more on thousands of internet-connected devices. You can watch as much as you want, whenever you want without a single commercial â€“ all for one low monthly price.

How much does Velura cost?

Watch Velura on your smartphone, tablet, Smart TV, laptop, or streaming device, all for one fixed monthly fee. Plans range from $5 to $15 a month. Its FREE for everyone. No extra costs, no contracts.

Where can I watch?

Watch anywhere, anytime. Sign in with your Velura account to watch instantly on the web at velura.com from your personal computer or on any internet-connected device that offers the Velura app.

How do I cancel?

Velura is flexible. There are no pesky contracts and no commitments. You can easily cancel your account online in two clicks. There are no cancellation fees â€“ start or stop your account anytime.

What can I watch on Velura?

Velura has an extensive library of feature films, documentaries, TV shows, anime, award-winning Velura originals, and more. Watch as much as you want, anytime you want.

Is Velura good for kids?

The Velura Kids experience is included in your membership to give parents control while kids enjoy family-friendly TV shows and movies in their own space with PIN-protected parental controls.
